AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <url>feedback</url> will help us to improve it.

main.title: FormsIE
main.note: FormsIE is currently live as a standalone system that will soon be available as a building block, enhancing its versatility and integration capabilities.
main.description: Revamp your unit's workflow with FormsIE, an integrated solution designed for the creation and management of online forms. Say goodbye to paper and PDF forms and introduce a new era of efficiency and cost savings. FormsIE is responsive, accessible and efficient, ensuring seamless digital interactions for both administrators and users.

section1.title: Modern and Intuitive
section1.description: The interface works seamlessly on any device. The FormsIE platform simplifies form creation and management, and provides immediate feedback to users, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience.

section2.title: Secure
section2.description: Sensitive information remains safeguarded by using encryption and access controls. FormsIE also complies with data protection regulations such as GDPR, providing peace of mind about data privacy and security.

section3.title: Customisable
section3.description: With the FormsIE intuitive interface, it is easy to design bespoke forms to suit specific needs. Logic features reduce the time and effort traditionally associated with completing a form. As dynamic forms, they adapt to user inputs and provide a personalised user experience.

section4.title: Instant Online Payments
section4.description: Streamline your payment processes by integrating online payment options into your forms. With FormsIE, you can collect payments seamlessly and securely, simplifying financial transactions for both administration and users.

section5.title: Accessible
section5.description: FormsIE is designed to meet accessibility regulations such as the EU Web Accessibility Directive, ensuring that all users can easily access and interact with online forms.

section6.title: Dedicated Support
section6.description: From design and implementation to technical support, the FormsIE team of experts is here to help you every step of the way.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to transition to the next level of digital forms? Contact us to schedule a demo and to learn more about how FormsIE can simplify and improve your unit's operations.
